summary: Build a web-based messenger called LensGram with user onboarding (name/email/username), username search, follow/connection requests gating chat and calls.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- LensGram wordmark logo with modern sans-serif lettering and subtle lens/camera motif, warm neutral palette (lensgram-logo.dim_1200x400.png)
- Minimal lens/camera icon mark for favicon/app badge, flat design, warm neutral palette (lensgram-icon.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Add authentication via Internet Identity and require a signed-in Principal for all app features.
Implement first-time onboarding to collect and persist a user profile with display name, email, and unique username (case-insensitive uniqueness).
Add user discovery: enable searching for other users by exact username and show a user result card with username and display name.

Implement a connection (follow) request system: users can send a follow request to another user; the recipient can accept or reject; only mutually connected (accepted) pairs can chat or initiate call requests.
Implement 1:1 messaging between connected users, including creating a conversation thread per connected pair and sending/reading messages with timestamps.
Add a ‘call’ feature as call requests (signaling only): allow connected users to initiate a call request and allow the recipient to accept/decline/end; show call state updates in the UI.
Create the main navigation and pages for LensGram: Onboarding (first-time), Search/Discover, Requests (incoming/outgoing), Chats list, Chat detail (with call controls).

Define and enforce a coherent visual theme for LensGram (distinct style, consistent colors/typography/layout) across all pages using Tailwind and existing UI components; avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.
Add generated static brand assets and use them in the UI: an app logo and a small favicon-style icon.

new_feature_requests.summary: User onboarding/registration collecting name, email, and username
User discovery: find/search users by username
Connection system: send/accept follow requests; only connected users can chat or call
